verses.verse: For, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> in <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and in that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> I shall <S%H7725>bring<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%>

I will also <S%H6908>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and will <S%H3381>bring<s%> them <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat,<s%> and will <S%H8199>plead<s%> with them <S%H8033>there<s%> for my <S%H5971>people<s%> and for my <S%H5159>heritage<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they have <S%H6327>scattered<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2505>parted<s%> my <S%H776>land.<s%>

And they have <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> for my <S%H5971>people;<s%> and have <S%H5414>given<s%> a <S%H3206>boy<s%> for an <S%H2181>harlot,<s%> and <S%H4376>sold<s%> a <S%H3207>girl<s%> for <S%H3196>wine,<s%> that they might <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> have you to do with me, O <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> and <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1552>coasts<s%> of <S%H6429>Palestine?<s%> will you <S%H7999>render<s%> me a <S%H1576>recompense?<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H1580>recompense<s%> me, <S%H7031>swiftly<s%> and <S%H4120>speedily<s%> will I <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H1576>recompense<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head;<s%>

<S%H834>Because<s%> you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> my <S%H3701>silver<s%> and my <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and have <S%H935>carried<s%> into your <S%H1964>temples<s%> my <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> things:

The <S%H1121>children<s%> also of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have you <S%H4376>sold<s%> to the <S%H3125>Grecians,<s%> that you might <S%H7368>remove<s%> them <S%H7368>far<s%> from their <S%H1366>border.<s%>

<S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H5782>raise<s%> them out of the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you have <S%H4376>sold<s%> them, and will <S%H7725>return<s%> your <S%H1576>recompense<s%> on your own <S%H7218>head:<s%>

And I will <S%H4376>sell<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and they shall <S%H4376>sell<s%> them to the <S%H7615>Sabeans,<s%> to a <S%H1471>people<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> off: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

<S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> you <S%H2063>this<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles;<s%> <S%H6942>Prepare<s%> <S%H4421>war,<s%> <S%H5782>wake<s%> up the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H582>men,<s%> let <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> draw <S%H5066>near;<s%> let them <S%H5927>come<s%> up:

<S%H3807>Beat<s%> your <S%H855>plowshares<s%> into swords <S%H2719><s%>and your pruning <S%H4211>hooks<s%> into <S%H7420>spears:<s%> let the <S%H2523>weak<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> I am <S%H1368>strong.<s%>

<S%H5789>Assemble<s%> yourselves, and <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and <S%H6908>gather<s%> yourselves together <S%H5439>round<s%> about: <S%H8033>thither<s%> cause your <S%H1368>mighty<s%> ones to <S%H5181>come<s%> <S%H5181>down,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Let the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> be <S%H5782>wakened,<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up to the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3092>Jehoshaphat:<s%> for <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H3427>sit<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

<S%H7971>Put<s%> you in the <S%H4038>sickle,<s%> for the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H1310>ripe:<s%> <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H3381>get<s%> you <S%H3381>down;<s%> for the <S%H1660>press<s%> is <S%H4390>full,<s%> the fats <S%H7783>overflow;<s%> for their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> is <S%H7227>great.<s%>

<S%H1995>Multitudes,<s%> <S%H1995>multitudes<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision:<s%> for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H2742>decision.<s%>
The <S%H8121>sun<s%> and the <S%H3394>moon<s%> shall be <S%H6937>darkened,<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars<s%> shall <S%H622>withdraw<s%> their <S%H5051>shining.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> also shall <S%H7580>roar<s%> out of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5414>utter<s%> his <S%H6963>voice<s%> from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>shake:<s%> but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be the <S%H4268>hope<s%> of his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and the <S%H4581>strength<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

So shall you <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7931>dwelling<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain:<s%> then shall <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and there shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through her any <S%H5750>more.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5197>drop<s%> down new <S%H6071>wine,<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> shall <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H2461>milk,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3212>flow<s%> with <S%H4325>waters,<s%> and a <S%H4599>fountain<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and shall <S%H8248>water<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7851>Shittim.<s%>

<S%H4714>Egypt<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolation,<s%> and <S%H123>Edom<s%> shall be a <S%H8077>desolate<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> for the <S%H2555>violence<s%> against the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> they have <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H5355>innocent<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> in their <S%H776>land.<s%>
But <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>
For I will <S%H5352>cleanse<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> that I have not <S%H5352>cleansed:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>
